## Générations
```{r generations}
    vecteur = rep(0, 50)
    for (i in 1:50){
      myseed = set.seed(i)
```

```{r uniques}
    syn_ctree = syn(df, method = "ctree")
    replicated.uniques(syn_ctree, df)
```
